```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(biclust)
library(knitr)

data(BicatYeast)
set.seed(1)
res <- biclust(BicatYeast, method=BCPlaid(), verbose=FALSE)
```

Row
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
    
### Heatmap
    
```{r}
p = par(mai=c(0,0,0,0))
heatmapBC(BicatYeast, res, xlab="", ylab="", order=TRUE)
par(p)
```

### Parallel Coordinates
    
```{r}
parallelCoordinates(BicatYeast, res, number=4)
```
   
Row
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Bicat Yeast Data for Cluster #4

```{r}
# only display table for values in cluster 4
kable(BicatYeast[which(res@RowxNumber[, 4]), which(res@NumberxCol[4, ])])
```
